item.title: Trump meets with Zelenskyy, European leaders for Ukraine talks at White House
item.description: President Trump is hosting Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and European leaders at the White House on Monday. Follow live updates.

item.title: 7/14: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: Trump gives Russia a 50-day deadline to make peace; Trump crowns Chelsea at FIFA Club World Cup final as FIFA opens office in Trump Tower

item.title: 8/18: CBS Mornings Plus
item.description: Hurricane Erin could bring life-threatening surf to the East Coast. Also, why millennials are turning tough love into a trend.

item.title: Many U.S. jobs are falling further behind inflation, study finds
item.description: Incomes are still trailing inflation four years after the pandemic-era surge in prices, causing a financial pinch for many households.

item.title: Air Canada union remains defiant after ordered to end strike on Monday
item.description: Canadian regulators once again ordered union leaders to end Air Canada's work stoppage on Monday, while employees remain defiant.
